mccs.midnightconfig.title: Minecraft Command Studio Config
mccs.midnightconfig.openaiApiKey.tooltip: The API key for OpenAI, which is used to generate commands. You can get one at https://beta.openai.com/
mccs.midnightconfig.scriptInterval.toolt: The interval between each command execution. The lower the value, the more commands will be executed per second.
mccs.midnightconfig.alwaysOnTop.tooltip: Whether the window should always be on top of other windows.
